chapter.name: Introduction
chapter.heading: First Heading
chapter.paragraph: Images are added to the document using either the external-graphic or instream-foreign-object elements. Use the external-graphic element to include a file in JPEG, GIF, TIFF, BMP, or PNG formats. Use the instream-foreign-object element to include an image defined in Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) format.
